label.en: What stakeholders / implementing bodies were involved in the Approach?
Specify stakeholders and describe their roles. If relevant, also specify gender, age, status, ethnicity, etc.)

helptext.en: If relevant, indicate gender, status and ethnicity and mention who accepted /resisted, who benefited / was excluded and if equity was advanced.

label.en: If precise year is not known, was the Approach initiated
Indicate year of termination (if not continued to date)
Were decisions on the selection of the Technology(ies) made
Was training provided to land users / other stakeholders?

helptext.en:
If no, go to question 5.2

If yes, please answer the following sub-questions

label.en: If relevant specify gender, age, status, ethnicity etc

label_view.en: Were decisions on the selection of the Technology(ies) made

label.en: Do land users have access to advisory service?
If yes, is the service provided

label_view.en: If yes, is the service provided

label.en: Have institutions been established or strengthened through the Approach?
Describe institution, roles and responsibilities, members, etc.
mainly by land users supported by SLM specialists?
through a participatory approach involving all relevant actors?
mainly by SLM specialists with consultation of land users?
evaluation of well documented SLM knowledge (evidence based decision making)
social / cultural / religious norms and values
availability / access to financial resources and services
legal framework (land tenure, land and water use rights)
land governance (decision making, implementation and enforcement)
knowledge on SLM, access to technical support
markets (to purchase inputs, sell products) and prices

helptext.en: Do not use exactly same name as used for the corresponding Technology (QT), try to name the main characteristic of the Approach (name of project/programme/initiative, name of implementation / extension / promotion method used, etc.)
Describe the Approach in one sentence containing key words. The definition of an approach is very important as it determines whether anyone searching the database will read further.

Please provide a first image of the SLM Approach. You can add more images later.

Maximum file size: 3 MB. Valid file formats: JPG, PNG, GIF.

label.en: Define the area in which the SLM Approach has been applied

helptext.en: Make sure that the description contains the key characteristic / distinct features of the Approach, its aims / objectives, methods used, stages of implementation, roles of involved stakeholders, strengths and weaknesses. This summary has to provide a comprehensive / concise picture of the Approach to outsiders. After having gone through the whole questionnaire come back and revise / complement this section.

label.en: Stakeholders involved in the Approach and their roles
Photos showing impressions of the SLM Approach

helptext.en:
Provide photos showing stakeholders interacting with each other / implementing / in training, etc.

Provide at least two digital files (jpeg, raw, pdf ...), i.e. scans from prints, scans from negative/positive films or digital photos.

Photos should be of high quality/high resolution and not manipulated or distorted.

Explanation (description) is required for each photo submitted! Photos should match the description given in 2.2

label.en: Dates of initiation and termination of the Approach

helptext.en: Specify and indicate implementing agencies in question 3.1

label.en: Conditions enabling or hindering the implementation of the Technology

helptext.en: Several answers possible. If for the same condition there are enabling as well as hindering factors, tick and specify both of them.

label.en: Decision making on the selection of SLM Technology(ies)

helptext.en:
The SLM Approach (herein after referred to as the Approach) defines how implementation of one or several Technology(ies) was achieved (including capacity building, organisation of the implementation, decision making, technical and material support, change of legal framework and policies) and who achieved it (including all stakeholders involved and their roles).

All types of Approaches may be documented using the WOCAT QA. Besides SLM activities introduced through projects or programmes, WOCAT includes indigenous practices and spontaneous adoptions or adaptations of Technologies. In the case of a project, we restrict ourselves to those elements within the project that are directly or indirectly relevant to SLM.

label.en: Participation and roles of stakeholders involved
Technical support, capacity building and knowledge management
